Welcome to Prodige-core's documentation!
===========================================

Collection of functions for a more common analysis/display of the `PRODIGE <http://NOEMA-PRODIGE.github.io>`_ program.

This includes simple to use commands to make publication ready figures, as well as some convenience function to handle the data.

     :maxdepth: 2
     :caption: Contents:

     installation
     usage
